resources.string: Crispy, golden flakes of sweetened corn. \n It\'s a great choice for a breakfast cereal. It reduces heart diseases and maintain lungs health.
Breakfast time is always fun when you know you\'ll be eating your favorite cereal. Crunchy and Crispy treat. Contains essential vitamins and minerals.
Breakfast cereal made with flakes of corn, honey, three types of sugar and chopped peanuts. It brings you an irresistible selection of duly deciding choices.
Packed with delicious fruity taste, fruity aroma and bright colors made with wholegrain and sweetened. It is a part of a complete breakfast.
Made with wholegrain cereal and with honey to give it its taste.
A traditional breakfast food made from processed cereal grains. High fiber, promote health and blends well with other foods.
Made with crispy oven-toated puffed rice cereal with the yummy taste of marshmallow.
